Qualifiers.Scope: Lot area calculations in Palo Alto
Exclusions: Pole portion of a flag lot

Dimensional.Name: Gross lot area
Dimensional.Description: Size of the lot from lot line to lot line

Specs.Name: Creek channel definition
Specs.Source: Santa Clara Valley Water District’s easement or top-of-bank

Procedures: Subtract street right-of-way from gross lot area
Subtract pole portion of a flag lot from gross lot area
Subtract creek channel from gross lot area

Mandatory: Subtract areas defined as exclusions from gross lot area
Dependencies: Determining the top-of-bank may require a surveyor

Special cases: In some areas like Barron Park, lots may extend to the middle of the street, but the lot is defined by the edge of the public street easement or ROW
